subject: Fwd: picture of mary

Hi Everyone,
These beautiful photos were sent to me by one  of my cts. she took them, jus
t thought you would like to have them  too.
sf

 
 
  
____________________________________
 From: GmPsalms37
To: Snowfire L
Sent: 8/20/2009 11:23:41 A.M. Eastern  Daylight Time
Subj: picture of mary



Dear  Snowfire, 
Thank you so much very for your spiritual advice and sharing your  
experiences.  I had a wonderful time talking.   I feel  comforted to know my family 
in heaven is ok, even though they were anxious to  talk to me.  I didn't get 
to find out how they are doing.  I  love them very much.    Sorry I did not 
get to say  goodnite to you since I lost track of time and it was very  
late.   
Below is a couple of photos I took.  I was trying to  take a picture of Our 
Lady of Sorrows statue.  It lets you know that  the Mother of God is also 
there in church protecting her son.  Thank you  and God bless!     
Sincerely, Grace 
email: _GmPsalms37@..._ (mailto:GmPsalms37@...)   
July  12, 2008 An image appeared when photographing the statue of St. Mary 
Our Lady  of Sorrows. 
Saint Mary of Sorrows Church, 5222 Sideburn Road, Fairfax, VA  22032 during 
the Volunteer Retreat, Benediction, and Prayer  Intentions. 
Photos taken by Grace Macaranas, Legion of Mary,  Presider 
Praesidium, Mary, Queen of Peace 
St. Columba Parish, Oxon Hill, Maryland  20745
 
 
 
 

 
____________________________________




--ce8.5c97ebc1_alt_bound
